Onilo necesita el préstamo para la compra de gran variedad de productos como arroz, azúcar, manteca, café, agua, pan, galletas, refrescos, salsas, pastas, etc. y así seguir realizando su negocio, el cual le brinda una gran parte de sus ingresos. 
Onilo con el préstamo espera que sus ventas aumenten y que este le sirva para cubrir los pedidos solicitados por sus clientes a diario y gracias a esto poder mejorar un poco su calidad de vida  y la de su familia. 
Su sueño es hacer crecer su negocio y  con esto poder seguir apoyando a su familia.


Choluteca, Honduras – Septiembre del  2013
texts.en:
Young Onilo is very hard-working, humble and responsible. He lives with his family in a community in the south of Honduras.  Onilo makes a living selling basic staple goods in his mini-supermarket, which he has had for over ten years.

Onilo needs this loan to buy rice, sugar, butter, coffee, water, bread, biscuits, drinks, sauces, pastas, in order to continue working. His work provides him with a big part of his income.

Onilo hopes that, with this loan, his sales will increase. He hopes that this loan will be of great help to him as he does not have the necessary products to fulfil his customers' daily orders. Thanks to this loan Onilo will be able to improve his family's quality of life.

Onilo’s dream is to expand his business and, with it, continue supporting his family.

Choluteca, Honduras, September 2013

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, butter, coffee, water, bread, biscuits, drinks, sauces, pastas, and more, for his business.

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en:
This is Arlene, 51, a resident of Cabrera, Pasay, Philippines. She is married to Nelson, an employee, and is a mother to their children. Arlene, together with her husband, manages their household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Arlene operates a house rental business, renting on a monthly basis. She also sells frozen and processed foods for additional income. She earns a minimum of 25,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) in sales every month.
To help her continue operation of her business, she is requesting a PHP 25,000 loan. She will use the loan for the repair and maintenance of her room for rent. 

Arlene dreams that her business will get bigger and hopes to have a good future. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and also draws strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for the repair and maintenance of her room for rent.

loans.name: Mariben

texts.en:
Mariben is married and has four children.  She runs a retail store and snack vending business. She has been in this business for more than four years as an aid to her husband's income to provide a living.

She joined GDMPC and borrowed a loan to purchase raw ingredients to cook. She is hopeful to improve her business and to be able to provide the needs of her children in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients to cook

loans.name: Parveen

texts.en:
Parveen is a 33-year-old married woman and has five children. She has had a business of goat selling for many years. She buys kids (baby goats) at a lower price, works hard to raise them for one to two years, and then sells the goats at a higher price in her community or the market. She also sells milk to her neighbors to generate an extra amount of income. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market.

Parveen is motivated to provide her family with a beautiful life, food and clothing. She wants to increase her income by expanding her business and therefore has contacted Kashf Foundation for a loan of 20,000 PKR to purchase three baby goats. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level.

loans.use: to purchase three baby goats

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
Helen is 32 years old and married with three children, two of whom are in school. Helen works very hard to provide for them.

Helen runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 20,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase canned goods, beverages, candies, soap, shampoo, etc.  She has been in this business for 4 years.

In the future, Helen would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase canned goods, beverages, candies, soap, shampoo, etc.

loans.name: Dolores

texts.es: El señor Dolores es originario de la ciudad de Teustepe. De 56 años de edad, casado y padre ejemplar de 7 hijos ya independientes. Es de oficio Agricultor y comerciante, dedicado al cultivo de maíz, frijoles y trigo, además a la venta de condimentos. Inicio en este negocio hace 25 años con la venta de condimentos de forma ambulante, el cual ha sido de mucho provecho. Su meta próxima es comprar más condimentos para salir a vender. Solicita el préstamo para comprar nuevos productos como: canela, clavo de olor, achiote, comino, entre otros, con el fin de aumentar sus ventas y ofrecer una variedad de productos. Estima que el financiamiento le será de mucha ayuda porque  le generara más ganancias y aumentara su clientela. Su plan futuro es comprarse una camioneta para usarla en su trabajo.
texts.en: Dolores is originally from the city of Teustepe.  He is 56 years old, married and an exemplary father to seven now independent children.  Dolores is a farmer and businessman, making a living growing beans, corn, and wheat, as well as selling condiments.  Dolores started this business 25 years ago, selling condiments as a street vendor.  This was very very successful.  Dolores' next goal is to buy more condiments to take out and sell. He is applying for this loan in order to buy new products such as cinnamon, clove, achiote, cumin, and more.  This was he can increase his sales and offer a greater variety of products.  Dolores expects that this loan will be a great help because it will generate higher profits and he will increase his customer base.  Dolores' future plan is to buy a truck to use in his work.

loans.use: to buy new products such as cinnamon, clove, achiote, cumin, and more.

loans.name: Glendy Nahy

texts.es: Glendy, tiene 24 años de edad, es casada, tiene un hijo y reside en el municipio de Quimistán, Santa Bárbara. Ella ha establecido su propio negocio de video juegos. Este negocio lo tiene en su casa donde habilito un espacio para instalar las pantallas y los juegos. ya cuenta con buena clientela. El préstamo que ha solicitado a ODEF es por 15,000 lempiras para comprar mas CD de video juegos y poder ofrecer variedad a sus clientes. Su plan siguiente es adicionar servicios secretariales y de internet y también ampliar el local.
texts.en: Glendy is 24 years old, married, has a son. She lives in the town of Quimistán, in Santa Bárbara.  Glendy has a video games business, which she runs out of her home.  She has a space where she has the computer monitors and the games.  Glendy already has a good customer base.  Glendy is applying for a loan of 15,000 Lempira from ODEF in order to buy more video games in order to offer more variety to her customers.  Glendy's next plan is to offer secretarial services, Internet, and to expand her premises.

loans.use: to buy video games in order to offer more variety and better service to her customers.

loans.name: Suhbatjon

texts.ru: Сухбат молодой и активный парень в возрасте 27 лет. Он женат и имеет троих детей. Несмотря на свои молодые годы Сухбат имеет много опыта в предпринимательской деятельности. С юных лет он пробовал заниматься разным видом торговли. Но сейчас он упорно развивает основной свой бизнес. Он занимается продажей веников. Этот товар имеет большой спрос в сельской местности, так как не имея техники, они производят уборку в своих дома с помощью веников. Сухбат закупает веники у мастеров, которые плетут эти веники, и затем продаёт в своём посёлке на местном базаре. Этот бизнес приносит хороший доход, а также Сухбат дополнительный доход от продажи скота. Его жена помогает ему выращивать и продавать скот. У него имеется одна корова и маленький телёнок. Сейчас Сухбат желает закупить ещё одну партию веников для развития своего бизнеса. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку веников. Сухбат заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Suhbat is a young and active guy of 27. He is married and has three children. Despite his young age, Suhbat has a lot of experience in business activities. From an early age, he was trying to engage in different types of trade. But now he is persistently developing his core business. He sells brooms. This product has great demand in rural areas; since there are no machines, they clean their homes with the help of brooms. Suhbat buys brooms from artisans who weave them, and then sells them in his village at the local bazaar. This business brings a good income, and for additional income Suhbat sells cattle. His wife helps him to raise and sell livestock. He has one cow and a small calf. 

Now, Suhbat wishes to buy another batch of brooms to develop their business. Therefore, he turned to Arvand and wants to receive a loan to buy mops. 

Suhbat thanks Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: to buy brooms

loans.name: Sakeena

texts.en:
Sakeena is a 29-year-old married woman. She has been running a business purchasing and selling animals for many years. She buys animals (baby goats and baby cows) at low prices, brings them up, and then her husband sells them out in the market at higher prices. She has six children and four of them are school-going.

She needs to earn much more to meet her everyday expenditures including food, clothing and education. She has requested a loan of 30,000 PKR to purchase two more goats. She has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf Foundation and currently she is in her 4th loan cycle with a good credit repayment history.  She hopes to grow her business and dreams of giving a good and quality education to her children through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to purchase two more goats

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a motocycle to support community health work

loans.name: Airen

texts.en:
Airen is 31 years old, married, and has three children who are all in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

Airen runs a general store in the Philippines. She has requested a 8,500 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell. Airen has been in this business for two years and sells a variety of items such as sardines, snack foods, and other groceries. In the future Airen would like to save money to expand her business and to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Kanlé

texts.fr: Kanlé est une femme de 57ans mariée à un magasinier et a deux enfants, l’ainé de 30ans et le dernier de 24ans. Elle exerce depuis 2009, son activité de revendeuse dans un bar. Elle emploie deux personnes et sert à manger à tous clients. Elle demande son second prêt auprès de WAGES pour continuer la restauration et épargner. Elle compte ouvrir un autre bar et avoir une bonne condition de vie.
texts.en: Kanlé is a 57-year-old woman who is married to a storekeeper. She has two children, of whom the oldest is 30, and the youngest is 24. She has had a retail business in a bar since 2009. She employs two persons and provides food service to all comers. She is asking for her second loan from WAGES to continue her restaurant business and to save money. She plans on opening a bar and having good living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her restaurant

loans.name: Parveen

texts.en:
Parveen is a 41-year-old, married woman. She has been doing a business, selling animals in her community. She has years of experience in her business and she makes enough money to contribute to the family's income. Parveen has one goat and four calves. She also sells milk to generate an extra amount of income. Her husband is employed, with low salary income. She has four children, including one son and three daughters. She is very motivated to provide them with a beautiful life, with good food and clothing.  She has improved her business to meet the day-to-day expenses of life. 

This is Parveen's fourth year with Kashf Foundation. She is happily running her business with this support. Now, she has requested a loan of PKR 45,000/- to purchase one more calf and feed for cattle. She expects a boost in her earnings and dreams to expand her business in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase one more calf and feed for cattle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a motocycle to support in community health work

loans.name: Zuhro

texts.ru: Зухро родилась и выросла в сельской местности. Она с детства помогала своим родителям по скотоводству и выращивания сельхоз культур. Зухро после замужества не работала. Она родила 7 детей и занималась их воспитанием. Зухро заботливая мать для своих детей и хранительница очага своего дома. Она всегда старается для благополучия своих детей. Зухро обеспечивал ее муж, но несколько лет назад он умер. Зухро теперь хочет организовать свой бизнес, так как она нуждается в деньгах. Она хочет организовать бизнес скотоводством, так как она имеет все условия для развития данного бизнеса. Ее сын будет помогать ей введению бизнеса. Она обучилась в курсе «Добейся Успеха» организованного Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Она уверена в себе, что сможет развевать свой новый бизнес. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для покупки скота, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она нуждается вашей финансовой поддержке.
texts.en:
Zuhro was born and raised in a rural area. From an early age, she helped her parents raise livestock and grow crops. After getting married, Zuhro stopped working; she had seven children and was occupied with raising them. Zuhro is a caring mother and homemaker, and always acts in the interest of her children's welfare. 

Zuhro's husband provided for her, but he passed away a few years ago. She now wants to start her own business because she needs an income. She would like to raise livestock and has the right conditions in place. Zuhro's son plans to help her start. Zuhro has already taken a course titled "Achieve Success", organized by the Association of Businesswomen, and received a certificate. She is confident that she can grow her new business. Zuhro is requesting a loan of 5000 somoni to buy livestock and start her business. She requires your help in this endeavor.

loans.use: To buy cattle and start a new business

loans.name: Munira

texts.ru: Мунира воспитательница детского сада города Худжанд. Ей 39 лет. Она замужем и имеет троих детей. Мунира работает в детском саде около 10 лет. Она обожает детей и поэтому выбрала эту профессию. Ее муж в данное время находится вдали от семьи. Он вынужден был покинуть семью и уехать в заграницу, чтобы работать и обеспечивать семью. Старший сын Муниры студент. Он учится во втором курсе Политехнического Университета. Двое младших детей еще учатся в школе. В этом году Мунира не смогла накопить достаточно денег для оплаты учебы сына. Она сейчас в затруднительном положении. Ей срочно нужно оплатить за контракт сына до начала его экзаменов, иначе он получит не допуск в сдаче экзаменов. Единственное решение данного положения Мунира видит в получении кредита. С этой целью она обратилась в МДО "Хумо". Поддержите Муниру!
texts.en:
Munira is a nursery-governess at a kindergarten in the city of Khujand. She is 39 years old. She is married and has three children. Munira has been working in a kindergarten for about 10 years. She loves children and therefore chose this profession. Her husband is currently living far away from the family. He was forced to leave the family and go abroad to work and provide for the family. 

Munira's eldest son is a student. He is studying in his second year at the Polytechnic University. The two younger children are still in school. 

This year, Munira was not able to save enough money to pay her son's tuition. She is now in a difficult position. She urgently needs to pay for her son's contract before his exams, or he will not get admission into his exams. The only solution to this quandary that Munira sees is to get a loan. With this aim, she turned to MDO Humo.

loans.use: to pay tuition for her son

loans.name: Atipay Group

texts.es:
La socia Luz Rocio pertenece al banco comunal ATIPAY ,la socia tiene 41 años de edad y es conviviente, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de calzados por catalogo, la socia vende diferentes tipos de calzados para sus clientes que le solicitan como calzados para damas ,caballeros y niños, la socia vende de forma ambulatoria y a pedido, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de zapatos para damas para su negocio.
Los demás socios se dedican a la preparación de refrigerios, movilidad escolar, docente, apoyo de encuestas, venta de calzados, venta de cosméticos, alquiler de disfraces típicos y otros son restauradores de obras de arte, empleados públicos y otros docentes de música. 
Los socios que salen en la foto adjunta pidieron permiso para llegar tarde a la reunión por motivos de trabajo.
 La socia agradece a los inversionistas y se comprometen a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Luz Rocio belongs to the Communal Bank ATIPAY, she is 41 years old and lives with her partner. As part of her daily activities she sells shoes by catalog (footwear for women, men and children), either working as a street merchant or through orders that her customers place.

Luz has been in this business for some time now, and it is going well thanks to the efforts that she invests in this activity. She wants to keep on working like this in order to continue to provide support to her family. Luz is now requesting this loan to buy women's shoes for her business. 

The other partners in this group work in diverse activities: the production of snacks, school transportation, teaching, surveying assistant, selling shoes, selling cosmetics, renting out traditional costumes, restoring art, employees of the public sector, and teaching music.

loans.use: to buy women's shoes for her business.

loans.name: Los Solidarios Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “LOS SOLIDARIOS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Laura ella es soltera y tiene 19 años; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de joyas, la socia vende aretes, pulseras y collares, la socia lleva a diferentes lugares a vender, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 4 años en este negocio y le va my bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender las joyas. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar aretes, pulseras y collares.
 
 
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de celulares, negocio de venta de joyas, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de comida.


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: The members belong to the "LOS SOLIDARIOS" communal bank in the district of Cusco, in the province and department of the same name.  One member is Laura, who is 19 and single.  She works selling jewellery: earrings, bracelets and necklaces.  She sells her goods in different places, working from 8am until 6pm.  She has been running her business for 4 years and is very successful.  Her dream is to have premises from which to sell her jewellery.  She is applying for the loan to buy earrings, bracelets and necklaces.  The other members of the group have businesses selling mobile phones, jewellery, groceries and food.  The member is grateful to those who are helping her to achieve her dream in this way and she guarantees that she will make her repayments in the set time.

loans.use: to buy earrings, bracelets and necklaces.

loans.name: Sharif

texts.ru: Шараф трудолюбивый и порядочный мужчина в возрасте 55 лет. Он женат и имеет троих детей. Вот уже 27 лет он работает водителем микроавтобуса, он является опытным водителем. У него имеется много клиентов, которые постоянно заказывают его услуги, и он получает от этой работы хороший заработок. Также в семье дополнительный доход приносит сын, который работает в России и каждый месяц отправляет своей семье денежные средства. Шараф имеет в планах построить для своей семьи новый дом с хорошими условиями. Сейчас у него имеется некоторая сумма денежных средств, но этого недостаточно, чтобы закупить все необходимые строительные материалы. Поэтому Шараф обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку строительных материалов для постройки своего дома. Шараф заранее благодарит Арванд за финансовую поддержку и очень надеется на положительный результат.
texts.en:
Sharaf is a hardworking and respectable man of 55. He is married and has three children. 

For 27 years already, he has been working as a minibus driver. He has become an experienced driver. He has many customers who are constantly requesting his services and he gets good earnings from this work. His son, who is working in Russia, also brings additional income to the family and every month sends monetary support. 

Sharaf has plans to build for his family a new home with good conditions. Now he has a certain amount of money but not enough to buy all the necessary building materials. Therefore, Sharaf turned to Arvand and wants to get a loan for the purchase of construction materials for building their home. 

Sharaf thanks Arvand in advance for the financial support and very much hopes for a positive result.

loans.use: to buy a building materials

loans.name: Carlos Enrique

texts.es:
Carlos, tiene 25 años, es casado, vive con su esposa y su abuelo en casa propia. El cultiva granos básicos para generar los ingresos de su hogar. Su abuelo le enseño el oficio desde que era un niño y se ha independizado con su negocio hace cinco años. Con la inversión comprara fertilizantes, herbicidas, abonos y semilla, para ampliar el área de siembra y que su cosecha sea mayor, con los ingresos pagara el préstamo y le cubrirá las necesidades que tienen.
Carlos aspira sacarle el mayor provecho al crédito para mejorar su economía, ampliar el negocio y seguir trabajando para tener un patrimonio que ofrecer a los futuros hijos.
texts.en:
Carlos is 25, married, and lives with his wife and his grandfather in their own home. He grows staple crops to generate income for the household.  His grandfather taught him this occupation since he was a young boy and he started on his own with his business five years ago. 

With the loan Carlos plans to buy fertilizer, herbicide, compost and seeds to increase his sowing area and obtain a bigger harvest. With the income he will pay off the loan and cover all their needs. Carlos wants to use his loan to the best advantage to improve his economic situation, to expand his business and to continue working in order to have an inheritance to leave to his future children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicide, compost and seeds.

loans.name: Azizmoh

texts.ru: Азизмох молодая и целеустремленная женщина. Она родилась в 1985 года в горном Таджикистане, где природа подарила людям возможность развивать  скотоводство и земледелие. Азизмох очень рада, что живет в такой стране как Таджикистан. Она хочет использовать все возможности и организовать свой бизнес скотоводством. Она планирует купить скот, откармливать несколько месяцев и перепродавать на местном рынке. С полученного дохода она хочет обеспечить своего одного ребенка со всеми необходимыми средствами. Азизмох замужем за трудолюбивого человека. Ее муж будет помогать ей введению бизнесу. Азизмох обучилась в курсе "Добейся Успеха" организованного Ассоциация Деловых Женщин. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для покупки скота, чтобы организовать бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Azizmoh is a goal-oriented young woman. She was born in 1985 in mountainous Tajikistan, where nature has provided the opportunity for animal husbandry and farming. Azizmoh is very happy to be living in a country like Tajikistan. 

Azizmoh would like to make the most of every opportunity and establish a business in raising livestock. She wants to use her income to provide her child with all the necessary means. Azizmoh is married to a hardworking man who will help her start her business. She also completed a course titled "Achieve Success", organized by the Association of Businesswomen. She is requesting a loan of 5000 somoni to buy livestock and establish her business. She appreciates your kindness.

loans.use: To buy cattle and start a new business

loans.name: Saodat

texts.ru: Саодат из Явана начинающая швея. Ей 21 год. Она замужем, но еще детей не имеет. Саодат обратилась за кредитом, чтобы купить ткани для шитья. У нее дома есть швейная машинка и она хочет дома начать собственный швейный бизнес. До этого времени она шила только для себя. Теперь Саодат решила быть независимой и самой начать зарабатывать. Когда Саодат приобретет ткани, она будет шить из них национальные женские платья на заказ. На данный момент у нее отсутствует источник дохода и для Саодат начала швейного дела единственный выход от финансовых трудностей. Ей очень важна Ваша поддержка.
texts.en:
Saodat from Yavan is an aspiring seamstress. She is 21 years old. She is married but does not yet have children. 

Saodat requested a loan to buy fabrics for sewing. She has a sewing machine at home and wants to start her own home sewing business. Until now, she has been sewing only for herself. 

Now, Saodat has decided to be independent and to start earning herself a living. When Saodat acquires fabric, she will sew from them national women's dresses on order. At the moment, she does not have a source of income and for Saodat starting a sewing business is the only way out of financial difficulties.

loans.use: to buy fabric for starting a sewing business

loans.name: Ghulam  Fiza

texts.en:
Ghulam Fiza is a 32-year-old married woman and a mother of two children.  For about 10 years she has been in the business of hand embroidery.  She makes beautiful patterns for the people of her community.  Her designs are much in demand and she has managed to accumulate a clientele that allows her to contribute to the expenses of her home.  She also stitches clothes as a side business to meet the daily household expenses.  

To help her to continue her operations, she has requested a loan of 25,000 PKR to buy reels of threads in different colors, packs of beads, sequins and stones for its embellishment.  This will allow her to be able to cater to more customers consistently.  She hopes to increase her income by targeting more customers.  She dreams of a bright future for her children and desires to build her own house as she is living in a rented house with her family.

loans.use: to buy reels of threads in different colors and packs of beads, sequins and stones for its embellishment.

loans.name: Maqsood

texts.en: Maqsood is a 59-year-old widow and the mother of two children. She wants to take out a loan for her son (the man shown in the picture), who has run a small tailoring shop for the last 13 years. He is motivated to provide all facilities of life to his family. He has good communication skills and counts on a good client list. In the beginning of his business, he faced many problems because of a lack of business knowledge and experience. But now he has learned both and developed his business. Maqsood has requested a loan of PKR 25,000 to purchase raw material like packs of buttons, spools of thread, collars. etc. for her son's business. With the help of this loan, he would be able to meet the increasing demands of his clients and generate more revenue. Maqsood is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her son and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to purchase raw material like packs of buttons, spools of thread, collars, etc. for her son's business.

loans.name: Belinda

texts.en:
Belinda is 50 years old and married with one child in school, and works very hard to provide for them.

Belinda runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 5,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell like soap, shampoo, milk, sugar, can goods, etc.

Belinda has been in this business for 17 years. 

In the future Belinda would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell like soap, shampoo, milk, sugar, can goods, etc

loans.name: Dylene

texts.en:
Dylene is 28 years old and single.

Dylene works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and she has requested a PHP 8,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

She has been running the general store for three years and she also earns an income from pig-fattening.

Dylene aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Irene

texts.en:
Irene is 36 years old and is married with three children. Her three children attend school.

Irene is in the agricultural business raising cows in the Philippines.  Irene requested a 7,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to buy vitamins for her cows.

Irene has been raising cows for three years now, and has borrowed one time in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Irene would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy vitamins for her cows

loans.name: Mahbuba

texts.ru: Махбуба является такой личностью, которая может преодолеть  трудности и продолжить  жить дальше. Она воспитывает своих 2 детей одна, так как ее муж бросил ее и женился на другой женщине. Махбуба не имеет источника дохода и живет очень бедно. Ее родители помогают ей. Махбуба хочет организовать свой бизнес и обеспечить своих детей. Она мечтает, чтобы ее дети получили высшее образование и стали высококвалифицированными людьми. Она планирует организовать бизнес скотоводством.  Она обучилась в курсе «Добейся Успеха» организованного Ассоциация Деловых Женщин. Махбуба от данного курса получила много новой информации. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для покупки скота. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Mahbuba is the kind of person who can overcome obstacles and continue to live her life. She is raising her two children after her husband left her and married another woman. Mahbuba has no source of income and lives in poverty. Her parents help her.

Mahbuba wants to start a business in raising livestock in order to provide for her children. She dreams of her children one day receiving higher education and becoming highly skilled individuals. She completed a course titled "Achieve Success", organized by the Association of Businesswomen, where she obtained a wealth of new information. Mahbuba is requesting a loan of 5000 somoni to buy livestock; she appreciates your kindness.

loans.use: To buy cattle and start a new business

loans.name: Sera

texts.en:
Sera is asking for a loan because she believes that through it she will improve her business.

The previous loan enabled her to save money from her food stall business.  She is requesting for a loan of 50,000 KES to purchase onions, vegetables, and fruits for her business.

She feels that she was able to make a good investment with her previous loan, which to date, has allowed her to maintain her level of profit to help her family cover their personal expenses.

loans.use: to purchase onions,vegetables,and fruits for her business.

loans.name: Josefina

texts.en:
Josefina is 54 years old and married. She has nine children. Two of her children are in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur, with a food-vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 30 years.

Josefina requested a PHP 20,000 loan amount through NWTF. She will use the loan to buy ingredients for her food business. In the future, Josefina would like to save money to expand her business, and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Parveen

texts.en:
Parveen is 56 years old and lives in Lahore, Pakistan with her four children.  She belongs to a poor family.  She has requested a loan from KIVA partner BRAC Pakistan. 

She wants the financing to buy supplies/accessories like cell phone batteries, chargers, casings, head phones, cell phone bags, etc. for her husband’s cell phone accessories shop.  As this shop is the only source of income for their family, she wants to expand it through this financing and make her life happy. 

Her husband is very experienced and professional in his dealings and has been operating his business for the past three years.  Parveen is hopeful that the loan will be a productive one for them and bring positive changes in the life of their family.

loans.use: to buy supplies/accessories like cell phone batteries, chargers, casings, head phones, cell phone bags, etc

loans.name: El Triunfo Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Comité El Triunfo está haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza, con el que quieren conocer como esta cada una y conforme a ello poder trabajar. Son mujeres jefas de familia que luchan mucho por los suyos para mejorar cada día más.
Una persona a destacar es María, quien vende frutas de estación, frescas y ricas, se destaca por ser una persona bastante entusiasta, que con su trabajo y esfuerzo está dando a su familia lo que ella no pudo tener. Su meta es poder seguir creciendo e ir mejorando su nivel de pobreza con la ayuda de la fundación y su grupo.
Pide de este crédito para compra frutas frescas para la venta, y así seguir trabajando, mejorando sus ingresos y ayudando a su familia.
texts.en:
The group called El Triunfo Committee is taking the poverty elimination survey in order to get to know each of their situations and to be able to work according to them.  They are all female heads of household that strive much for their loved-ones in order to improve more every day.

A person worthy of note is María who sells seasonal, fresh, delicious fruit.  She stands out for being quite an enthusiastic person who by means of her effort and work is giving her family everything she was unable to have.  Her goal is to be able to continue to grow and to gradually improve her poverty level with the Fundación’s and her group’s help.

She’s asking for this loan to buy fresh fruit to sell thus staying in business improving her income and helping her family.

loans.use: to buy fresh seasonal fruit to sell.

loans.name: Ruhiya

texts.ru: Рухия заботливая мать 5 детей. Она замужем. Ее муж пенсионер и получает маленькую пенсию. Это пенсия не хватает даже для покупки продуктов питания и поэтому Рухия хочет организовать свой бизнес и получить доход. Рухия так как выросла в сельской местности и помогала своим родителям по скотоводству, имеет большой опыт по данной отрасли. Она хочет организовать свой бизнес скотоводством. Она обучилась в курсе «Добейся Успеха» организованного Ассоциация Деловых Женщин. Она планирует с полученного дохода улучшить условию проживания. Она хочет помочь своим внукам получить хорошее образование. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 сомони для покупки скота. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Ruhiya is married, and is a caring mother to her five children. Her husband is retired and receives a small pension, which is not enough to buy food. For this reason, Ruhiya wants to start a business and receive an income. 

As she was born in a rural area and helped her parents with cattle breeding, Ruhiya has extensive experience in this area. Therefore, she wants to start a cattle breeding business. Ruhiya completed a course titled "Achieve Success", organized by the Association of Businesswomen. She plans to use her new income to improve her living conditions, including helping her grandchildren obtain a good education. She is requesting a loan of 2000 somoni in order to buy livestock. She is thankful for your kindness and generosity.

loans.use: To buy cattle and start a new business

loans.name: Divino

texts.en:
This is Divino. He previously accessed a PHP 10,000 loan that he used to buy spare parts, accessories, and pay for the maintenance of his Jeepney unit. His earnings were a big help for the education of his children and in his personal, household, and business expenditures.
 
He would like to apply for another loan, in the amount of PHP 15,000, to buy spare parts and pay for the maintenance of his Jeepney unit and also to buy some equipment for his repair shop. His profits from his business will definitely help him to sustain the family's daily needs and the educational expenses of his children. He looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in his heart.

Divino hopes that his business will continue to grow and he dreams to have a better living. Every week, he meets up with his co-fellowship* members to share stories of his life and business and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God he studies. 


* All Center for Community Transformation (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for the spare parts and maintenance of his jeepney unit for his transportation business.

loans.name: Shirly

texts.es: Shirly de 34 años de edad, desde muy joven estuvo involucrada en la actividad comercial y con esa experiencia, hoy desde hace 4 años,  emprendió su propio negocio,  generado ingresos par apoyar los gastos de su hogar. Su familia está compuesta por su cónyuge y sus 3 hijos, en edades de 7 a 13 años, que son el motor de su vida, y por ello se propone consolidar su negocio, con el fin de lograr cada vez un mayor bienestar. De viernes a domingos trabaja desde las 2 de tarde a las 8 de la noche, en la preparación y venta de almuerzos, y en repostería, como actividades complementarias;  y diariamente, se dedica a la venta de mercancía  variada, como calzado y ropa. Sus ventas las realiza de contado y a crédito y sus compras las hace en el centro de Barranquilla, donde encuentre las mejores ofertas, que impacten a su clientela. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará  vestidos y sandalias, para tener surtido su negocio en la época de mayor venta en el año, las navidades y el año nuevo.
texts.en:
Shirly, 34, has been involved in commerce since she was very young and using that experience started her own business four years ago to generate income to help cover her household expenses.  Her family consists of her spouse and three children whose ages range between 7 and 13 years.  They are her life’s moving force and because of this she plans to consolidate her business aiming at attaining better well-being each time.

She works weekends from 2 in the afternoon to 8 at night making and selling meals and pastries and as a complementary activity works every day selling varied merchandise like footwear and clothing.  She sells for cash and on credit and she makes her purchases in central Barranquilla where she finds the best offers that impact her clientele.

She’s currently applying for a Kiva loan, her first financing with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, to buy dresses and sandals in order to be well-stocked for the year’s highest sales season: Christmas and New Year’s.

loans.use: to buy dresses and sandals.

loans.name: Clemente

texts.es: Clemente tiene un taller de refrigeración, ubicado en un barrio del suroccidente de la ciudad, donde habita con su familia. Su experiencia de 32 años, la adquirió trabajando para una empresa de electricidad general, donde lo capacitaron en el tema de refrigeración, para ofrecer un servicio de excelencia a la clientela de esa empresa. Allí adquirió todo el conocimiento técnico y productivo y hoy ha logrado capitalizarlo en su propio negocio, generador de ingresos, pues en su taller de refrigeración, ofrece el servicio de mantenimiento de equipos como aires acondicionados, de neveras,  y la reparación de maquinarias como lavadoras.  Su día laboral inicia desde las 8 de la mañana y finaliza a las 5 de la tarde. Él compra en almacenes especializados en venta de repuestos, para adquirir piezas de calidad con las que trabajar mejor.  En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, segundo crédito que solicita a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará repuestos de equipos de refregeración, que son los que mas consumen los equipos y le permitirá  ahorrar los tiempos de respuesta a las solicitudes de su clientela. Hoy con su crédito en la Fundación, ha logrado un mejor desempeño y planea continuar su proceso de perfeccionamiento, mediante la capitación y actualización técnica, para salirle al paso a la competencia, que es su máximo desafío, pues avanza en conocimientos a pasos agigantados.
texts.en: Clemente owns a cold storage depot in a district in the south-west of the city, where he lives with his family.  He has 32 years' experience which he acquired when working for a general electricity company.  He received training in refrigeration so he could offer excellent service to the company's customers.  During his time there, he acquired technical and production know-how and he has now managed to capitalise on this in his own revenue-generating business.  In his cold storage depot he offers a maintenance service for equipment, such as air conditioning and fridges, and a repair service for machinery such as washing machines.  His working day begins at 8 in the morning and ends at 5 in the afternoon.  He buys his spare parts from specialised  dealers so that he has good quality parts which allow him to produce better work.  He is currently applying for a Kiva loan (his second through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation) which he will use to buy the most commonly needed spare parts for refrigeration equipment and which will enable him to respond more quickly to his customers' demands.  Using his loan from the Foundation he has already managed to perform better and plans to continue this improvement process, using the grant and his up-to-date technical skills, to beat off competitors (his greatest challenge), as his knowledge is progressing in leaps and bounds.

loans.use: to buy in bulk replacement parts for refrigeration equipment

loans.name: Paso De Oro Group

texts.es:
El comité Paso de Oro es de la ciudad Lambaré actualmente están en el segundo ciclo, barrio paso de Oro. Este barrio es el más pobre de la ciudad de Lambaré, las viviendas están hechas en su mayoría de hule, maderas y algunas viviendas de materiales. La fundación paraguaya es una de las primeras instituciones en ingresar a la zona y fomentar el espíritu emprendedor en las familias, trabajando con las integrantes en varios indicadores de superación de Pobreza, para poder mejorar y ayudarlas en sus vidas.
Una de ellas es Carmen, quien tiene un pequeño Kiosco, surtido con todo tipo de productos de primera necesidad, está trabajando duro para salir adelante, es un ejemplo de lucha y sacrificio. Hoy pide de este préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de insumos para su negocio, como ser golosinas, bebidas, gaseosas, jugos, galletitas y demás, y así seguir trabajando e invertir en su fuente de ingresos, para ir mejorando cada día.
texts.en:
The “Paso de Oro” (Golden Step) committee is from the city of Lambaré’s Paso de Oro neighborhood and they are currently in the second cycle.  This neighborhood is Lambaré’s poorest.  Most of the dwellings are rubber, wood and some are of material.  Fundación Paraguaya is one of the first institutions to come into the zone to encourage the families’ entrepreneurial spirit working with members on several poverty elimination indicators to help them improve their lives.

One of them is Carmen who has a small stand stocked with all types of basic staple goods.  She’s working hard to get ahead and is an example of struggle and sacrifice.  She’s asking for this loan today to buy supplies like snacks, beverages, soft-drinks, juice, cookies, etc. for her business to continue working and investing in her source of income to continue improving every day.

loans.use: to buy snacks, soft-drinks, beverages, juices, cookies and others.

loans.name: Tekoporave Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Tekoporave está en su tercer ciclo  del programa de comité de mujeres, también están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza, como una herramienta de ayuda para ellas. Son amigas y vecinas de la ciudad de Caaguazú, luchadoras y trabajadoras.
Emilia es una de ellas, también hizo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, comenta que se dedica a la venta de prendas de variadas clases con lo cual está mejorando mucho su vida y ha ayudado a su familia.
La Sra. Solicita este crédito para comprar más prendas, en especial de verano, ya que se acerca el calor y quiere seguir trabajando y dando a sus clientes lo que pide.
texts.en:
The group called Tekoporave in its third cycle in the women’s committee program.  They are also taking the poverty elimination survey as a tool to aid them.  They are hardworking, tenacious friends and neighbors from the city of Caaguazú.

Emilia is one of them.  She also took the poverty elimination survey and comments that she works selling varied clothing items with which she’s improving her life very much and has helped her family.

She’s asking for this loan to buy more clothes, especially for summer, because the hot weather is approaching and she wants to continue working and giving her customers wheat they are asking for.

loans.use: to buy summer clothes to sell.

loans.name: Gulbahor

texts.ru: Гулбахор после того как развелась с мужем вернулась в дом родителей с одним ребенком. Она не имеет высшее образование и нигде не работает. Ее родители живут крайне бедно и не в состоянии обеспечить Гулбахор и ее ребенка. Гулбахор хочет  организовать свой бизнес и иметь свой источник дохода. Она хочет организовать бизнес скотоводством, так как она имеет опыт по выращиванию скота. Она думает, что она вполне может развивать этот бизнес, так как ее место жительство весьма благополучный для скотоводства. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для покупки скота. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
After her divorce, Gulbahor returned to live in her parents' home with her child. She does not have a college degree or a job. Her parents live in poverty and do not have the means to provide for Gulbahor and her child. 

Gulbahor wants to start a business and have her own source of income. She wants to practice animal husbandry as she has experience in raising livestock. She thinks that she is fully capable of developing such a business because her place of residence has favorable conditions for animal husbandry. Gulbahor is requesting a loan of 5000 somoni in order to buy cattle. She is thankful for your kindness and generosity.

loans.use: To buy cattle and start a business

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.en: Zenaida is 49 years old, married, and has three children, one of whom is in school. Zenaida is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Zenaida requested a 6,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. Zenaida has been raising pigs for three years now, and has borrowed two time in the past from NWTF to sustain her business. In the future, Zenaida would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Makhina

texts.ru: Махина трудолюбивая и ответственная женщина в возрасте 32 лет. Она замужем и имеет двоих детей. Махина живёт в маленьком посёлке. Она очень любит своих детей и старается дать им всё необходимое для того, чтобы они могли расти, развиваться и реализовывать себя в обществе. Для этого Махина занимается своим бизнесом, чтобы иметь постоянный доход. Она закупает и продаёт детскую одежду. Закупает она свой товар на большом оптовом рынке и продаёт на местном рынке своего посёлка. Для этого у неё имеется собственная лавка. Сейчас Махина желает расширить ассортимент своего товара, ей необходимо закупить побольше зимней одежды, так как начинается зимний сезон. Поэтому она обратилась в Арванд и желает получить кредит на покупку одежды. Махина очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Makhina is a hardworking and responsible 32 year-old woman.  She is married and has two children.  Makhina lives in a small village.  She loves her children very much and tries to provide them with everything necessary, so that they could grow, develop and realize themselves in the society.  For this Makhina is involved in her own business to have a constant income.  She buys and sells children's clothing.  She buys her merchandise at a large wholesale market and sells it at a local market in her village.  She has her own retail outlet.  Now Makhina wishes to expand the selection of her merchandise and needs to purchase more winter clothing because the winter season is starting.  This is why she came to Arvand and wishes to obtain this loan to purchase clothing.  Makhina hopes very much for a positive result and thanks Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: to buy winter clothing

loans.name: Merlene

texts.en:
Merlene works hard to support her family.  She is married and has a business buying and selling clothing in the Philippines.

Merlene has requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks of clothes to sell, like blouses, shorts, shirts, etc., to sell.

Merlene has been in this business for one year now.

In the future, Merlene would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of clothes to sell, like blouses, shorts, shirts, etc., to sell

loans.name: Daisy

texts.en:
Daisy works hard to support her family. She is single and has a fishing business in the Philippines.

Daisy requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

She has been in this business for five years.

In the future, Daisy would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

loans.name: Nadia

texts.en:
Nadia is 30 years old, a married woman and the mother of two children. Her husband is a driver by profession, and he provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family's expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. 

For this reason, Nadia has applied for a loan from Kiva’s field partner, BRAC Pakistan, for her husband. He wants to buy new tires and little bit of engine maintenance for his vehicle. This will help him to drive more smoothly and provide better transportation service to his passengers. Nadia hopes that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business. Nadia says "thanks," to Kiva and to its field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy new tires and pay for engine maintenance for the auto rickshaw.

loans.name: Katupyry Group

texts.es:
El grupo Katupyry está en su ciclo número 1 del programa de comité, donde todas se comprometieron a dar su mayor esfuerzo, cumplir con las capacitaciones y ahorrar como un medio de valor de sus ingresos.
Nancy es una de ellas, quien se dedica a la venta de frutas y de verduras, cuenta que vio una gran oportunidad en este grupo y que por eso se unió. También agradece por esta oportunidad que le hará una mejor persona y poder crecer también.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de frutas y verduras para la venta, con lo que podrá seguir trabajando y ganándose el sustento.
texts.en:
The Katupyry group is in cycle #1 in the committee program.  All have committed to put in their best effort, to attend training and to save as a means of increasing the value of their income.

Nancy’s one of them.  She sells fruit and vegetables.  She says that she saw a great opportunity in this group and that’s why she joined.  She’s also grateful for this opportunity that will make her a better person and to be able to grow also.

She’s asking for this loan to buy fruit and vegetables to sell which will allow her to continue working and earning a living.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en:
This is Beatrice. Her previous loan was a big help in her business. She was able to add more stock in her business.

Now, she would like to apply for a loan of KES30,000. She will use this loan to buy more stock to sell, including cooking oil, sugar, and parrafin. Her profits from business will definitely help her to improve her living standard. She looks forward to this financial increase, gladly and with gratitude.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell, including cooking oil, sugar, and parrafin

loans.name: Nargis' Group

texts.en:
Nargis is a 52-year-old married woman living with her five children and spouse in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband has been selling bearings for vehicles and motors for many years. He buys steel bearings from the scrap market in large quantities at low rates, renews them and sells them for a higher rate as a retailer. 

Nargis is the mother of five children and it is very difficult to afford the educational expenses and household expenses as well. She is doing her best to fulfill all the needs of her family members. She wants to prove herself a successful mother; she is required to provide them with good food, health, and education. 

Currently she has requested a loan for her husband to buy more bearings so that he can increase his sales. He expects a boost in his earning and wishes to spend part of the profits on the expansion of his business.

Nargis is very thankful to Kiva and its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy scrap bearings for renewal and sale

loans.name: Sarwar

texts.en:
Sarwar is a 47-year-old woman who is living in Punjab, Pakistan, with her husband and five children. 

Her husband owns a small livestock farm, the only source of income for his family. He sells sheep, goats, cows, etc. He raises livestock and then sells them in the market at a good price. He is the only person in the family earning a living. He has lots of expenses to pay for that include, gas, electricity, water bills, children's school fees, other household needs and livestock feed. In addition to all this, he looks after the livestock alone. His net income is too low to meet all these expenses. 

Sarwar has requested a loan from Kiva partner BRAC Pakistan with the goal of helping her husband to purchase feed and goats for the farm. This will help him to increase his sales, which will be helpful for him to gradually increase his net income as well.  

Sarwar dreams of her children's bright future and prays for her husband's good health. She wants to say that Brac is working very well in the field of microfinance, and she is very thankful to BRAC and Kiva for helping her.

loans.use: to purchase livestock feed and goats for her husband's livestock business.

loans.name: Aguatería Saguazu Group

texts.es:
La Aguatería Saguazu está en la ciudad de Paraguarí, en una zona rural, con mucho sacrificio se organizaron entre los vecinos para dicho fin, viendo la necesidad de contar con agua potable, y por sequía reinante en aquella época,  primeramente empezaron con 20 usuarios, hace más de 10 años, actualmente presta sus servicios a  180 familias abarcando las comunidades rurales vecinas.
Alicio tiene 55  años es  presidente de la comisión de la Junta de Saneamiento  de Saguazu, firman con él,  Miguel el Vice Presidente y el sr Manuel tesorero de la comisión.
El crédito lo solicitan para la compra de un trasformador para utilizar en el tanque.
texts.en:
The Saguazu Water Supply is in a rural zone in the city of Paraguarí.  The neighbors joined together with much sacrifice for this purpose seeing the need they had for potable water and because of the drought that existed back then.  They started out initially over ten years ago with 20 users and it currently provides service to 180 families including neighboring rural communities.

Alicio, 55, is president of the Saguazu Drainage Board and Miguel, the vice-president and Manuel, the treasurer of the commission will be co-signing with him.  

They will use the loan to buy a transformer in order to use the tank.

loans.use: to buy a transformer.

loans.name: Fatima

texts.en:
Fatima is a 42-year-old, married mother of five children. She is a Syrian citizen, who has been working at selling mobile phones and accessories since 2009. She uses her income to help her husband in making their living and covering their family's expenses.

Fatima is a hard worker, well known in her region for the special quality of the goods she sells and the services she provides. At the beginning she had financial problems, which were a major problem that limited her business development. Now she's facing these obstacles in a well managed way, and she hopes to keep on doing so, to improve her family's living, and to develop her business.

She is acquiring a loan from Kiva's partner, Al Majmoua. She will use this loan to increase her business merchandise with newly-released mobile phones and accessories. She hopes that in the future she will develop her business to start electronic money transfer operations, too, which will attract more customers.

loans.use: to increase her business merchandise with newly-released mobile phones and accessories

loans.name: Ma. Berlinda

texts.en:
This is Ma. Berlinda. She previously accessed a 12,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase more quantities and varieties of grocery items and products needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help for her children’s education, and with her personal household and business expenditures.
 
She would like to apply for another 14,000 PHP loan to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages, and other products to add to her inventory. The more items displayed at the store the better. More items to sell will result in better profit. Her business profits will definitely help sustain her family’s daily needs and children’s education expenses. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Ma. Berlinda hopes that her business will grow bigger and dreams to have her own house. She meets every week with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business and to also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God that she studies.

*All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries, and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Juanito

texts.es: Don Juanito de 25 años de edad, estado civil casado, viven en la Comunidad de Palca Grande, tienen ingresos económicos por la venta de papa, oca haba cultiva 3 Has. De terreno que se encuentra en la comunidad de Palca Grande cuenta con experiencia de 8 años en el rubro. Don Juanito y su esposa necesitan capital para comprar insumos agrícolas como ser abono orgánico, semilla de papa, el capital que tenía gasto en la celebración de su matrimonio ya que recién decidió casarse con la señora por la iglesia, Don Juanito comenta que ahora con el capital comprara los insumos agrícolas cultivara en más superficie de terreno done tendrá mayor ingreso económico para ahorro de dinero para el estudio de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Juanito is 25 years old and married.  They live in the Palca Grande community.  They get income from selling potatoes, ‘oca’ [native tubers], and broad beans.  He cultivates three hectares of land that is in the Palca Grande community.  He has eight years of experience in the field.

Juanito and his wife need capital to buy agricultural supplies like organic fertilizer and potato seeds.  He spent the money that he had on their marriage celebration.  They recently decided to get married by the church.

Juanito comments that he will now use the money to buy agricultural supplies.  He will cultivate more land where he will get greater income.  He will save the money for his children’s education.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer and potato seeds.

loans.name: Amelia

texts.en:
Amelia is very thankful for the previous financial assistance extended to her, as she was able to buy needed spare parts and accessories for her jeepney unit. Her income from this business also helped pay her everyday household expenditures. She has been in this business for 18 years. She and her husband are working hard to provide for their everyday needs.
 
She would like to apply for another 30,000 PHP loan to buy spare parts and maintain their jeepney unit. Her profits from this business will definitely help her sustain their daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Amelia dreams of having another jeepney unit and hopes to have a better life. She meets with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week, where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

- Curiously, Jeepneys have purely American origins. They were first used by American soldiers helping the Philippines throw off the invading Japanese. Filipino ingenuity, however, managed to see this vehicle as an opportunity to earn, and modified the Jeep into a 20-seater jeepney, open enough to provide adequate ventilation, sturdy for every-day travel, and cheap enough to buy and maintain. Now, the jeepneys are one of the things that makes the Philippines truly the Philippines.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for spare parts and maintenance of her jeepney vehicle.

loans.name: Arsenia

texts.en:
Arsenia is 60 years old and married, with six children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. 

Arsenia has a rice retailing business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 9,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more stocks of rice to sell.

Arsenia has been in this business for three years. In the future, she would like to save enough enough money to rent a space at the public market.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of rice to sell.

loans.name: Rosaura Isabel

texts.es:
Rosaura, ha invertido con anterioridad créditos en su negocio que le ayudaron a mejorar los recursos para seguir adelante con su negocio y tener mejores ganancias, opta por un nuevo préstamo para comprar más cerdos, comida para alimentarlos e insumos agrícolas.
Gracias a la rentabilidad que hoy tiene en su negocio su familia tiene una mejor vida y siguen adelante brindándole el apoyo en sus actividades.
texts.en:
Rosaura has invested her previous loans in her business.  They helped her to improve the resources in order to get ahead with her business and to have greater income.

She is deciding on a new loan to buy more pigs, food to feed them, and agricultural supplies.  Thanks to the profitability her business now has, her family has a better life.  They get ahead, providing her with support in her business activities.

loans.use: to buy more pigs, food to feed them, and agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Danilo

texts.en:
Rice farming has been Danilo's business for almost 25 years. With his last crop, he earned a net income of 50,000 PHP, which he spent on the school fees for his children. He uses his profits for daily expenditures and school fees for his children. 

Due to insufficient funds he would like to take out a loan amounting to 40,000 PHP to purchase fertilizers and seedlings. He hopes that this requested loan will be granted so that his agricultural business will continue to grow.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizer and seedlings

loans.name: Genna

texts.en: Genna is 41 years old, married, and has three children, two of whom are in school. Genna is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Genna requested a 6,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. She has been raising pigs for two years now, and has borrowed two times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business. In the future, Genna would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Provia

texts.en:
Provia is a mother of six children who is determined to give her children the best in life despite the meager resources she has. She is a longtime farmer who has been in the farming business since 1999. Her farm is in a rural area in Igara in the Bushenyi District. Banana bacterial wilt is the main challenge in her business, since it affects the banana stems and hence the size and quality of the bananas harvested.

Provia has applied for 3,000,000 UGX to buy manure to apply on the farm so that she can have improved harvests. Her clients are the banana traders in her local area, and she believes that if she gets the loan she will supply them with better bananas and hence will satisfy her customers and keep the market. She has high hopes of being financially stable if the loan is given.

loans.use: To buy organic manure

loans.name: Felix

texts.es:
Félix, está acompañado, vive con su compañera de vida y sus tres hijos de 19,21 y 13 años. Sus actividades agropecuarias son la crianza de ganado, siembra de granos básicos y hortalizas. Su jornada la hace acompañado de sus tres hijos de 5:00a.m. Hasta 3:00p.m., esté oficio lo aprendió de su padre. Tiene como ventaja trabajar en su propio terreno por lo que no tendrá dificultad en manejar dichas actividades.
E l préstamo lo invertirá en compra de insumos agrícolas (abono, herbicidas, insecticidas), para sembrar hortalizas (tomate, chile, ejotes, etc.)
Su sueño es seguir trabajando para salir adelante con la responsabilidad de la deuda adquirida, generar los ingresos económicos, que les permitan a sus hijos tener una mejor alimentación y un negocio más amplio.
texts.en:
Félix is in a relationship.  He lives with his life partner and their three children, ages 19, 21, and 13.  His farming activities are raising livestock and growing basic grains and vegetables.

He is accompanied by his three children during his workday from 5:00 a.m. until 3:00 p.m.  He learned this trade from his father.  He has the advantage of working his own land.  Therefore, he will not have any difficulty managing these business activities.

He will use the loan to buy agricultural supplies (fertilizer, herbicides, and insecticides) to plant vegetables, (tomatoes, chilies, and beans, etc.).

His dream is to continue working in order to get ahead with the responsibility of the acquired debt.  He also dreams of generating income that will allow his children to have better food and a bigger business.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies (fertilizer, herbicides, and insecticides).

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La señora Maria tiene 61 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Itá, vive en casa de su hijo el mayor, y ella se dedica a la Costura hace más de 20 años. Ella pese a la edad es una persona muy trabajadora, que lucha y se esfuerza para poder ser de ayuda en la casa, y no sentirse una molestia.
Desde siempre ha trabajado y no teme a hacerlo. El préstamo que la señora Maria solicita es para la terminación de su baño del taller de costura, ya que así tendrá una mejor condición y podrá dar un mejor servicio a su clientela.
texts.en:
María, 61, lives in the city of Itá in her oldest son’s house.  She’s been sewing for more than 20 years.  Despite her age she’s a very hardworking woman who strives and struggles to be able to help at home and not feel like a burden.

She’s always worked and doesn’t shy away from it.  The loan she’s asking for will be used to finish her workshop’s bathroom so that it will be in better conditions to provide better customer service.

loans.use: to finish the workshop's bathroom.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy beans, rice, oil and sugar.

loans.name: Victor

texts.es: Don Víctor de 53 años de edad vive en la Comunidad de Palca Grande, de estado civil soltero, tiene ingresos económicos por la venta de papa, oca haba cultiva 3 Has. De terreno que se encuentra en la comunidad de Palca Grande cuenta con experiencia de 25 años en el rubro. Don Víctor necesita capital para comprar insumos agrícolas abono orgánico, semilla de papa, el señor Victor con los ahorros que tenía los gasto en la compra de terreno agrícola, Don Víctor comenta que con el capital comprara el abono orgánico oportunamente y cultivara en más superficie de terreno con el cual tendrá mayor ingresos económico esto le permitirá a la larga mejorar su vivienda donde vive actualmente.
texts.en:
VÍctor, 53, lives in the community of Palca Grande.  He’s single and earns income growing potatoes and oca [a tuber] on a three-hectare parcel located in the community of Palca Grande; he has 25 years’ experience in this line of work.

Víctor needs capital to buy agricultural supplies like organic manure and potato seeds.  He used his savings to buy the farmland.  Víctor comments that he’ll use the capital to buy the organic manure in a timely fashion and will plant a larger surface area to earn higher income which in the long-run will make it possible for him to make improvements to the house he lives in at present.

loans.use: to buy organic manure and potato seeds.

loans.name: Gleceria

texts.en:
Gleceria earns an income by operating a direct sales business. She previously accessed a loan in the amount of PhP 19,000, which she used to purchase merchandise items needed in her business. Her earnings improved a good deal, allowing her to provide for her child’s education and to support the family's personal, household, and business expenditures.
 
She would now like to apply for another PhP 19,000 loan in order to buy more merchandise items and new products to increase her product inventory. She believes that the more items she has on display and available on hand, the better. Having more items to sell will result in a better profit. The increased profits from her business will help her significantly in sustaining her child’s education and meeting the family's daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Gleceria hopes to gain more customers and dreams of improving her standard of living. She meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her life and business every week, as well as to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay micro-finance loans.

loans.use: to buy additional supplies and products to offer for sale, such as clothing, footwear, undergarments, and cosmetics

loans.name: Isaias De Jesus

texts.es: Isaías es originario de la comarca Las Banderas, padre de 2 hijos. Es de oficio comerciante, dedicado con mucho esfuerzo a la venta y compra de piedras canteras. Se siente agradecido con Kiva y Micrédito porque logro comprar más productos,  y crecer poco a poco su negocio. Solicita nuevamente un crédito para comprar piedras canteras y venderlo de forma ambulante, con el fin de aumentar la demanda de sus clientes. Estima que el financiamiento le generara más ingresos y así comprar productos y suplir las necesidades de sus clientes, además cumplir su sueño de comprar una camioneta.
texts.en:
Isaías is from the Las Banderas district; he’s father of two children.  He’s a merchant by profession, he buys and sells paving stones.  He’s grateful to Kiva and MiCrédito because he was able to buy more products and make his business gradually grow.

He’s asking for a loan once again to buy paving stones to resell from place to place hoping to increase customer demand.  He figures that the loan will generate higher income to buy products an meet customer needs as well as to reach his dream of buying a pick-up truck.

loans.use: to buy paving stones.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita is 58 years old, married, and has six children. She works very hard to provide for them. Lolita runs a general store in the Philippines, selling a variety of items such as soft drinks, soap, and shampoo, which she has been doing for 10 years.

Lolita is requesting a loan from NWTF for 8,000 PHP, which she will use to purchase more groceries to sell. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase groceries

loans.name: Dionesia

texts.en:
Dionesia is 54 years old, married, and has five children, one of whom attends school. She works very hard to provide for them. Dionesia runs a general store in the Philippines, which she has been doing for 31 years. 

Dionesia is requesting a loan from NWTF for 6,000 PHP, which she will use to purchase bread, canned goods, soft drinks, candies, soap, etc. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase bread, canned goods, soft drinks, candies, soap, etc.

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es: El señor Fernando actualmente se dedica a la prestación de servicios de sastrería, confecciona principalmente trajes a medida para instituciones y profesores además de pantalones y arreglos en general; su trabajo es muy solicitado esto debido a que cuenta con la experiencia necesaria obtenida en trabajos anteriores y por la prontitud de entrega. El señor Fernando está casado, su esposa es la que le ayuda en la confección de los trajes, tienen 2 hijos dependientes de sus ingresos; son personas responsables, trabajadoras y con ganas de superación; sus hijos se encuentran en edad escolar y son alumnos destacados; el motivo del presente crédito es para poder comprar rollos de tela para la elaboración de trajes esto debido a que consiguieron un trabajo grande y le falto material para poder terminar dicho trabajo, y así poder tener un beneficio más grande para él, su esposa y sus hijos.
texts.en:
Fernando currently works providing tailoring services.   He mainly works manufacturing outfits to order for institutions and teachers.  Also making pants and doing alterations in general.  His work is very sought-after because he has the necessary experience acquired in previous jobs and because of his quick turn-around time.

Fernando’s married and his wife helps him sew the outfits.  They have two children who are dependent on their income.  They are responsible, hardworking people who very much want to improve.  Their children are school age and are outstanding students.

The reason for the present loan is to buy bolts of fabric to make outfits because they got a large order and they ran out of fabric to complete it.  In this way, profits will be higher for him, his wife and his children.

loans.use: to buy bolts of fabric.

loans.name: Norma Del Carmen

texts.es: Norma del Carmen continúa esforzándose a través de préstamos en hacer crecer su negocio, el cual inició con la oferta de algunos productos básicos para clientes dentro de su barrio. Ella es la mano derecha de su esposo que labora como albañil, ambos comparten los gastos generales de la casa y la educación de sus tres hijos de 19, 14 y 10 años de edad, los cuales estudian en colegios públicos. Solicita el crédito para abastecer su pulpería de los siguientes productos: carne de res, pollo y cerdo, refrescos, azúcar, arroz, frijoles  y aceite. En el futuro ella piensa tener un puesto más grande en alguno mercado de la capital, porque su casa tiene poco espacio.
texts.en:
Norma del Carmen continues striving to make her business grow by means of loans.  She started the business with just a few basic staples for her neighborhood customers.  She’s her husband’s right hand; he works in construction.  They both share household expenses and their three children’s schooling costs.  The children are 19, 14 and 10 years of age and attend public schools.

She’s asking for the loan to stock her store with the following products: beef, chicken, pork, soft-drinks, sugar, rice, beans and oil.  In future, she plans to have a larger stand in one of the capital’s markets because her house doesn’t have much space.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Angela Group

texts.en:
Rabiha, age 48 (pictured at left), is the featured borrower in the Angela Group, which is comprised of three borrowers. Aline is in the center of the picture and Josette is at right.

Rabiha joined this group in order to acquire a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua. The three borrowers have joined together for this loan because they have always been neighbors and friends. 
 
Rabiha sells clothes and underwear items to earn a living. She began her business four years ago. She tells us that she intends to work hard on expanding her business with her current loan funds, because she will be able to increase her business capital. She also intends to work hard to restart her old business: she used to sell Brazilian gold at the beginning of her working experience, but she wasn't capable of expanding and increasing her capital. Today, with the available customers and with Al Majmoua's support, Rabiha might have the chance to improve her socioeconomic situation.
 
Rabiha and her husband have four children, and she puts as much effort as she can into helping her husband to provide them with the best possible education and standard of living.

loans.use: to increase her business merchandise with newly released autumn and winter collection items

loans.name: Leticia

texts.es:
Leticia  tiene 31 años de edad, vive con su hermano. Ella se  inició en el área de ventas desde el año 2005. Inicialmente comercializaba solo prendas de vestir para damas, hoy también vende calzados y artículos eléctricos a pequeñas ferreterías. Paralelamente tiene otro trabajo con sueldo fijo, es una persona muy trabajadora.
Gracias a los trabajos que  realiza ya está a muy poco de poder concluir la construcción de su casa propia.
