texts.en: Istoda is a woman with a beautiful soul and beautiful thoughts. She is married and is raising five children. Istoda works hard to earn money and feed her children. Four years ago she started her business buying and selling dried fruit. She has a shop in the local market. She is a very sociable woman and therefore is able to attract many customers. Istoda wants to increase her working capital and thereby increase revenue, since she needs more revenue. She is asking for a loan of 3000 KGS to buy dried fruit. She's awaiting your kindness and hoping for your mercy.

loans.use: buy dried fruit to increase sales.

loans.name: Julia Elena

texts.es: Julia, a sus 67 años de edad, se dedica a trabajar en su propio negocio, un puesto de venta de comidas y alimentos fritos ubicado al borde de una carretera muy transitada de la región de Córdoba, allí labora desde hace 10 años, de lunes a sábado de 6:00 am a 2:00 pm, cuenta con el apoyo de otra persona y de esta manera genera los recursos suficientes para llevar el sustento a su hogar y apoyar económicamente a sus 3 hijos, pues la carga económica recayó sobre ella luego del fallecimiento de su esposo. La cliente manifiesta que su edad no le impide seguir trabajando, pues le gusta lo que hace y además se siente útil. Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito para invertirlo en la compra de sillas y mesas, insumos al por mayor (carne, aceite, verduras, gaseosas, entre otros) y para realizar unas adecuaciones al espacio donde se encuentra ubicada; esto le permitirá mejorar la imagen del negocio y ofrecer más comodidad a sus comensales, además tendrá disponibilidad de insumos para aumentar su producción y sus ventas, todo esto se reflejará en el aumento de los ingresos con los que podrá seguir sustentando a su familia. Julia quiere seguir trabajando arduamente y espera poder cumplir el sueño de tener su negocio en un local propio ubicado en la ciudad, para seguir con su labor hasta que Dios se lo permita y dejar un buen legado para sus hijos.
texts.en:
Julia, at 67 years of age, has her own business, a stall where she sells meals and fried food. Her stall is located besides a very busy highway in the Córdoba region.  She has had this business for 10 years and works Monday to Saturday, from 6 a.m. till 2 p.m.  She has one other person to help her. In this way she generates sufficient income to support her household and to help her three grown children financially since this burden fell on her after her husband died.

This client states that her age does not prevent her from continuing to work since she enjoys what she is doing and feels useful. Currently she is requesting a loan in order to purchase chairs and tables as well as supplies wholesale (meat, oil, vegetables and soft drinks, among other items) and to make some improvements in the space where she is located.This will enable her to improve her business’ image and provide her diners with a more comfortable experience. In addition she will have supplies available to expand production and sales. All this will be reflected in an increase in earnings. Thus she will be able to continue supporting her family.

Julia wants to continue working hard and hopes to be able to fulfill her dream of having her business in her own locale, in the city. She wants to continue working as long as God permits and leave a good legacy for her children.

loans.use: to purchase tables and chairs and  wholesale supplies (meat, oil, vegetables and soft drinks, among other items) and to upgrade the space where she is located.

loans.name: Zemfira

texts.en:
Zemfira is a 57-year-old widowed woman. She has one son.  Zemfira is an IDP (internally displaced person) and lives with her son in the Agdash IDP Settlement.  She is a Fuzulu refugee. 

When she was 30, she started to learn to work in agriculture. Her parents were the ones who taught her to grow fruits and vegetables, since it was their only source of income. She has been growing vegetables and fruits for more than 10 years.

Zemfira’s income from her business is 150 AZN. In order to increase the living conditions of her family, she plans to expand her business. This requires a lot of dedication and effort. She believes in the near future her sons will help her to expand the business. Since the vegetable and fruits business is profitable and a fun business, she wants the business to continue and prosper. Zemfira needs a 1500 AZN loan to buy fertilizers, seeds and fruit trees. 

Her biggest wish is to offer her son an education so that he can have a good career and help his mother. This is going to be her first loan. Zenfira hopes that Kiva will help her.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, seeds and fruit trees.

loans.name: Josue Elias

texts.es: El señor Josué vive en la población de Entre Ríos, tiene un hijo dependiente del cual cuida y por el cual trabaja cada día para salir adelante, se dedica a la venta de ensaladas, comidas rápidas y otros aperitivos en un snack. su actividad económica se encuentra en una esquina de la plaza en un lugar estratégico donde va mucha clientela a consumir sus productos, el señor Josué  tiene un lote urbano lo cual adquirió con su esfuerzo del trabajo realizado y es donde quiere construir una vivienda ya que  actualmente vive en anticrético para ello solicita este préstamo para llevar a cabo la obra de construcción ya que el dinero con que cuenta no le alcanza. Con este crédito el señor Josué  podrá ser capaz de realizar su objetivo propuesto tener una casa donde vivir cómodamente.
texts.en:
Josué lives in Entre Ríos.  He has a dependent son he cares for and for whom he works every day in order to get ahead.  He works selling salads, fast-food and other snacks in his snack bar.  His economic activity is located on a corner of the square in a strategic spot frequented by many passers-by that come to enjoy his products. 

Josué owns an urban lot that he bought with much work effort where he wants to build his house since he’s currently living under the ‘anticrético’ modality [transaction whereby a property owner requests a "loan" from you in exchange for housing, which must be paid back to you at the end of your contract. If your loan is not repaid, the property owner could lose the property to you].  This is why he’s asking for the loan to carry out the construction project since he does not have enough money to do so.  With this loan, Josué will be able to reach his set goal of owning a house in which to live comfortably.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Maria Veronica

texts.es:
María Verónica tiene 39 años de edad, vive con su esposo e hijo, en una comunidad grande en la zona urbana de Cayalti, su población se dedica a la actividad de comercio y agricultura que pertenece a la Provincia de Chiclayo en la región de Lambayeque en la costa norte del Perú.

María Verónica es una mujer emprendedora se dedica desde hace 3 años al servicio de tipeos e impresiones en su propio domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para ampliar su negocio con la compra de útiles de escritorio y la otra parte para darle mantenimiento a sus máquinas ofreciendo un mejor servicio para sus clientes, generándole de esta manera mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
María Verónica, 39, lives with her husband and son in a large community in the Cayalti urban zone.  Its residents work in commerce and agriculture.  It belongs to Chiclayo Province in Lambayeque Region on Peru’s northern coast.

María Verónica is an enterprising woman who for the last three years has been providing  transcription and printing services at home.  She’s asking for a 1,000 new sol loan to expand the business purchasing office supplies and to service her machinery to provide better customers service thus ensuring higher income for her family.

loans.use: to buy office supplies.

loans.name: Honorita

texts.en:
Honorita is a 51-year-old married woman and a mother of four grown up children from Trinidad, Bohol. She runs a sari-sari store business selling various goods and items to the people in her area.

Honorita is asking for a loan to buy more stocks to sell like canned goods, candies, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries. With this, she will be able to attract and cater for more customers in her area. 

In the future, Honorita hopes to expand her store so that it will generate more revenue.

loans.use: to buy more stocks to sell like canned goods, candies, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries

loans.name: Saifullo

texts.ru: Сайфулло пекарь, скотовод и житель города Истаравшан. Ему 32 года. Он женат, детей пока не имеет. У Сайфулло собственный лепешечный цех, где он каждый день выпекает горячие традиционные лепешки для продажи. Одновременно Сайфулло занимается выращиванием крупного рогатого скота. Этим бизнесом он уже занимается 5 лет. Сайфулло обратился за кредитом для своей животноводческой деятельности. Он просит кредит, чтобы закупить одну корову и продолжить свой бизнес по откорму и продаже скота.
texts.en: Saifullo is a baker, a cattleman and a resident of Istaravshan. He is 32 years old. He is married but has no children yet. Saifullo owns his own bakery where he bakes traditional flat bread every day. At the same time Saifullo raises cattle. He has been doing this for five years. Saifullo applied for a loan for his work with livestock. He is asking for a loan to buy a cow and continue fattening and selling cattle.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Umeda

texts.ru: Умеда вместе со своей семьей живет в сельской местности. Она замужем и мать 5 детей. Умеда работает упорно с раннего утра до позднего вечера, для того, чтобы зарабатывать деньги и прокормить своих детей. Умеда более 10 лет занимается выращиванием сельхоз культур как картошка, лук и т.п. Она имеет свою землю. Ее муж помогает ей введению бизнеса. Умеда постепенно улучшает условию проживания для своих детей. Умеда должна построить дом для своего сына. Ее сын женат и имеет детей, но не имеет собственного дома. Умеда запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для покупки строительных материалов как цемент, древесина, камень и т.п. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Umeda and her family live in a rural area. She is married and the mother of five children. Umeda works hard from early morning until late at night in order to make money and feed her children. For more than ten years, Umeda has farmed crops like potatoes, onions, etc. She has her own land. Her husband helps run her business. Umeda is gradually improving living conditions for her children. Umeda must build a house for her son. Her son is married and has children, but does not have his own home. Umeda is asking for a loan of 5,000 KGS to buy construction materials such as cement, wood, stone, etc. She's awaiting your kindness and hoping for your mercy.

loans.use: buy building materials such as cement, wood, and stone.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a computer.

loans.name: Valentina

texts.es: Valentina es una señora de 66 años de edad, originaria del Rama, RAAN. Madre soltera de 2 hijos ya independientes. Su oficio es de Secretaria, dedicada con empeño a su negocio de Cyber y alquiler de Videos juegos. Negocio que inicio hace 25 años, el cual le resulto más rentable que su negocio anterior de estudios fotográficos. Hoy en día además del cyber cuenta con el alquiler de Videos juegos. Su meta próxima es tener equipos modernos y cumplir con la demanda de los clientes. Solicita el crédito para el mantenimiento de los equipos de computadora y comprar consolas de video  juegos, con el fin de brindar un mejor servicio  a los clientes. Estima que el crédito será beneficioso ya que aumentara las demandas y podrá cumplir con las necesidades de sus clientes. Su plan futuro es obtener más equipos tanto de computadoras como de videos juegos, para crecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Valentina is a 66-year-old lady from El Rama, RAAN (Northern Atlantic Autonomous Region). She is a single mother of two adult children. Her occupation is secretary. She works dedicatedly in her business, a cyber cafe where she also rents video games. She started her business 25 years ago, and it turned out to be more profitable than her previous business, which was a photography studio. In addition to the cyber cafe, today she rents video games as well. Her next goal is to update her equipment and meet her customers' demands. 

She is requesting this loan for computer equipment maintenance and to purchase video game consoles in order to give her customers better service. She estimates the loan will be beneficial because it will increase demand and she will be able to meet her customers' needs. Her plan for the future is to acquire more equipment, both computers and video games, to expand her business.

loans.use: to maintain her computer equipment and buy video game consoles.

loans.name: Elsa Maria

texts.es: Doña Elsa María, quien es madre soltera por efectos de viudez, se ha dedicado al abastecimiento de diversos productos perecederos todos los días en su barrio y los fines de semana prepara una deliciosa comida típica que se vende como pan caliente entre sus vecinos. Con este negocio, quien ha desarrollado a través de créditos otorgados anteriormente, ella ha podido apoyar a sus dos hijos, principalmente al menor que tiene capacidades diferentes. Elsa solicita el crédito para invertir en su negocio, comprando productos como: arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, cereales, refrescos y otros, garantizando que sus vecinos la apoyan al comprarle siempre.
texts.en: Elsa María is a single mother due to widowhood.  She’s worked supplying perishable items every day in her neighborhood and on weekends prepares delicious traditional meals like hot bread that she sells among her neighbors.  By means of this business that she’s developed over time thanks to the loans she’s been able to support her two children especially the younger one who is disabled. She’s asking for the loan to invest in her business purchasing such products as rice, beans, sugar, oil, cereals, soft-drinks and others ensuring that her neighbor will support her by buying from her always.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Abelardo

texts.en:
For four years, Albelardo has operated El Brother Tire Shop selling new and used tires in his tire repair shop. As the only employee of the shop, Albelardo normally finances his business from his savings. 

Recently, he needed funds to pay for the construction of a carport and for inventory. After a friend informed Albelardo about nonprofit microlender Accion Texas Inc., Albelardo applied and was approved for a loan.

Originally from Guatemala, Coban, Mexico, Albelardo says the loan will help his shop compete with the competition by making him look more professional. He says his future goal is to create jobs.

loans.use: to fund a carport and purchase inventory.

loans.name: Dora Del Socorro

texts.es: Dora es originaria de San Francisco Libre, Managua. De 51 años de edad, casada y madre de 4 hijos. Es de oficio comerciante, dedicada con esmero a su pulpería, la cual inicio hace varios años, con una venta pequeña, a medida de eso iba aumentando su nivel de compras y ventas. Hoy en día cuenta con variedad de productos en su negocio. Su meta próxima es comprar más productos para brindar una mercadería variada demandada por los clientes. Solicita el crédito para comprar productos principales tales como: arroz, azúcar, frijoles, aceite, entre otros, con el fin de satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes. Estima que con este crédito le ayudara a aumentar sus ventas y a obtener mayores  ganancias, además a aumentar la demanda de sus clientes. Su plan futuro es establecer una tienda de ropa, zapatos, etc.
texts.en:
Dora, 51, is from San Francisco Libre, Managua.  She’s married and mother of four children.  She’s a merchant by profession running her store  with much dedication.   She opened it several years ago with just a few goods but as her sales have increased she’s increased them.  Today, she has a wide variety of products in her store.

Her next goal is to buy more products to provide more variety to meet customer demand.  She’s asking for the loan to buy the main products like rice, sugar, beans and oil, among others in order to meet customer needs.  She figures that with the loan she’ll be able to increase sales and earn higher profits.  Also, customer demand will rise.  Her future plan is to open a store selling clothes, shoes, etc.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Sara

texts.es:
Sara tiene 55 años de edad, es separada y junto a sus hijas y 01 nieta en el distrito de Cayaltí una zona donde su población se dedica al comercio de animales menores y la agricultura, ubicado a 02 horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo en la Región Lambayeque en la costa norte del Perú.

Son una familia unida que se esfuerza por tener mejores condiciones de vida, ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de aves de corral, percibe ingresos por una mototaxi que lo alquila para uso de transporte y vende cerveza y alimentos.

Ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para invertirlo en la compra de aves de corral y tener más variedad para ofrecer a sus clientes, generándole mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Sara, 55, is separated living with her daughters and a niece in Cayalti district, a zone whose population works selling small animals and in agriculture.  It’s located two hours from the city of Chiclayo in Lambayeque Region on Peru’s northern coast.

They are a family that strives to have better living conditions.  She raises barnyard fowl to sell and earns income leasing out a mototaxi to provide transportation services.  She also sells beer and food.

She’s requested a 1,000 new sol loan to buy barnyard fowl and to have more variety to offer her customers thus ensuring higher family income.

loans.use: to buy barnyard fowl.

loans.name: Normaliza

texts.en:
Normaliza owns a retail store and raises hogs for sale. She is 38 years of age, married and blessed with two children who currently attend school. Normaliza's income from her retail store goes toward their daily consumption and allowances for her two children.

Normaliza wants to maintain her hog raising business, but due to insufficient funds, she is requesting a loan of PHP 40,000 (Philippine pesos). She will use this loan in purchasing hog feed and medicine to nourish her hogs with proper nutrition for reaching their optimum growth. 

Normaliza is hoping for approval of her requested loan amount so she can secure her family’s future and be able to let her two children finish their studies.

loans.use: to purchase hog feed and medicine for her hogs.

loans.name: Sakina

texts.en:
Sakina’s age is 42. She is married and lives with her husband and 3 children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband is doing a grocery job in a mill for very low wages. Her children are young still and fully dependent upon their parents. Sakina does not have any other source of income to meet household expenses so she decided to start a tailoring business at home.

Sakina purchases cloth at cheap rates, sews the garments and her husband supplies it into the market. She has been doing this since 2005. Now she has experience and knows cloth dealing very well. 

Sakina wants to utilize her clothing experience and wants to get more profit but she is compelled to take a loan due to her low financial condition. Therefore, she wants to take a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan. She hopes that she will utilize this loan positively and that she could grow her business. 

Sakina's dreams are to provide better facilities, living standards and charming clothes to her children.

loans.use: to buy cloth for her tailoring business.

loans.name: Kishwar

texts.en:
Kishwar is a 53-year-old married woman, living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She is the mother of six. Her husband works in a nearby factory. 

Kishwar owns a small business selling ladies ready-made garments at home. She purchases ready-made garments from the market with her husband at low prices and sells them in her community at a higher price. The ladies of the town like her clothing selection for dresses and demand more variety because it is the marriage season. She also suggests to ladies which dress suits them and which one should be worn according to occasion. Her husband affords all the expenses from his earnings and she contributes her earnings only to make savings. She requested a loan so that she could buy more variety of garments to fulfill the seasonal demand.

Kishwar wishes for a bright future for her children and her dream is to provide a better education for them. She is very thankful to Kiva and its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy readymade garments for resale.

loans.name: Virgen De Lourdes  (Jipijapa) Group

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Virgen De Lourdes está formado por 11 señoras que se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Jipijapa, cantón conocido con el nombre de la sultana del café por los extensos cultivos de café el cual tiene un sabor incomparable, por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente, ellos se dedican a varias actividades entre ellas la agricultura, y el comercio en general. 
Una de las socias de este grupo es la señora Karina Consuelo, tiene 31 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos de 11, 5 y 3 años de edad,  los dos mayores estudian en colegio y escuela. El marido es agricultor. 
Doña Karina Consuelo es una muy buena madre y esposa que realiza el crédito para ayudarle a su marido en su labor,  él tienen cultivos de maíz, maní y ciertas verduras, en la actualidad están en la época de recolección del maíz y el crédito lo van a emplear para pagar la mano de obra de dicha actividad y con esto poder guardar el maíz unos cuantos meses y luego venderlos a mejor precio ya que el precio que le pagan actualmente es muy bajo y al venderlo así tendría muchas pérdidas, es por eso que el crédito les permite guardarlo y luego si vender a un precio razonable que le permita tener ganancias por el bienestar de su familia.
Este crédito es para pago de mano de obra en la recolección del maíz, esta desde el inicio en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que recibe del banco. Sus sueños son ver que sus hijos terminen sus estudios y sean personas de bien. 
La foto pequeña es de una socia que no pudo estar presente cuando se tomo la foto del grupo.
texts.en:
The communal bank Virgen De Lourdes comprises eleven women who meet biweekly in the canton of Jipijapa, which is very well-known for its vast coffee plantations. The coffee from this region has an incomparable taste. The region is also known for its cuisine and the warmth of its people, who work in different fields like agriculture and trade in general. 

Karina Consuelo is one of the members of this group. She is 31 years old and lives in a common-law marriage. She and her partner have three children, who are ages eleven, five, and three. The two older ones are in school. Her husband is a farmer. 

Karina Consuelo is a very good wife and mother who is requesting this loan in order to help her husband with his work. They grow corn, peanuts, and some vegetables. They are currently harvesting their corn and will use this loan to hire help from laborers. This will allow them to store the corn for a few months before selling it for a better price, since current prices are very low and selling now would result in great losses. That is why this loan will allow them to store it and eventually sell it at a reasonable price that will report a profit for their family's wellbeing.

This loan will be used to pay for labor during the corn harvest. She has belonged to the communal bank from the beginning and enjoys it because of the help she receives from the bank. Her dream is to see her children finish school and become upstanding people.

The small picture depicts a member who was not able to be present when the group photo was taken.

loans.use: to pay for labor.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es: El Sr. Jorge vive en la comunidad de Colomi, de 28 años de edad, de estado civil soltero, tiene un hijo pequeño porque cuenta con la custodia de su hijo, vive en la casa de su madre, económicamente es independiente,  percibe ingresos económicos de la actividad agrícola ya que produce papa y haba en terreno de 2 Has de herencia de sus padres, con rotación de cultivos con experiencia en el rubro, El Sr Jorge requiere el crédito para la compra de semilla de papa y productos agroquímicos para la siembra de este año, necesita urgente estos insumos agrícolas por la época de siembra y aprovechar con esta época de lluvia, por tal motivo solicitar un préstamo.  Mencionar que con el crédito solicitado podrá realizar la siembra de papa y haba y contribuir con la seguridad alimentaria de la región y poder generar ingresos económicos a través de la agricultura.
texts.en:
Jorge lives in the Colomi communuty. He is 28 years old and single. He has a small child of whom he has custody. He lives in his mother’s house and is self-supporting. He earns a living from farming and produces potatoes and broad beans in a 2 hectare plot, which he inherited from his parents. He does crop rotation and has experience in this area.

Jorge needs a loan to purchase potato seed and agrochemicals for this year’s planting. He urgently needs these agricultural supplies for this year’s planting season so that he can take advantage of the rainy season. Thus he will be able to plant potatoes and broad beans this year and contribute to food security in the region and generate earnings through farming.

loans.use: to purchase seed potato and agrochemicals.
